plot: Many of us grow up with an image in mind of the perfect life - marriage, kids, great job, house, dog. But is that all we are living for? If your life was to come to an end tomorrow, what would you regret not having done yesterday?
title: Inspiration of the Past
plot_es: Many of us grow up with an image in mind of the perfect life - marriage, kids, great job, house, dog. But is that all we are living for? If your life was to come to an end tomorrow, what would you regret not having done yesterday?
plot_en: Many of us grow up with an image in mind of the perfect life - marriage, kids, great job, house, dog. But is that all we are living for? If your life was to come to an end tomorrow, what would you regret not having done yesterday?
